title: The Czar
description: Mick Petrovich is the star forward for the Chicago Norsemen, and the heir to a billion dollar vodka fortune. When he suffers a career-ending injury life seems hopeless. Until he sees a sexy blonde moving into the apartment next door.There’s only one rule to working at Petrovich Vodka—no fangirling over the owner’s son. But that’s no problem for Solana Werner, who just got her dream job in marketing at Petrovich. She’s sure she’ll never run in the same circles as Mick The Czar Petrovich. Then she sees who’s living next door to her new apartment.As Chicago’s sexiest hockey star turns on the charm, Petrovich Vodka’s rising marketing star struggles to find a way to have the man and keep her job. It’s a game of winner takes all. Can Solana and Mick find a way to come out on top?The Czar is a hockey billionaire office romance with a damaged hero, a strong heroine, sassy best friends, and a happily ever after that’s as good as a winning goal.
author: Selena Laurence
